ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE J. PAUL R. HOWARD, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario, to be Regional Senior Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario for the Southwest Region and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.
